scripts.image:cekit:copy: cp -R resources/modules dist/ && cp resources/*.yaml dist/
scripts.image:cekit:dist: pnpm cleanup && pnpm manifests:copy && pnpm manifests:update && pnpm manifests:bundle && pnpm image:cekit:copy && pnpm format && pnpm manifests:cleanup
scripts.manifests:bundle:gen: . ./node_modules/@osl/redhat-python-venv/venv/bin/activate && make -C ./dist PACKAGE_NAME="logic-operator-rhel9" VERSION="$(build-env oslOperatorBundleImage.version)" IMAGE_TAG="$(build-env sonataFlowOperator.buildTag)" IMAGE_TAG_BASE=$(build-env sonataFlowOperator.registry)/$(build-env sonataFlowOperator.account)/$(build-env sonataFlowOperator.name) bundle
scripts.manifests:cleanup: mv dist/bundle dist/modules/com.redhat.osl.bundleinstall/ && rm -rf dist/bin dist/config dist/hack dist/bundle.Dockerfile dist/PROJECT
scripts.manifests:copy:operator: OP_PATH=node_modules/@kie-tools/sonataflow-operator && cp -R ${OP_PATH}/config dist/ && cp -R ${OP_PATH}/bin dist/ && mkdir -p dist/bundle/manifests && cp ${OP_PATH}/bundle/manifests/sonataflow.org_sonataflow* dist/bundle/manifests/ && rm -rf dist/config/manifests/bases/*.yaml && cp ${OP_PATH}/Makefile dist/ && cp -R ${OP_PATH}/hack dist/ && cp ${OP_PATH}/PROJECT dist/
